dict.acceptation: 努力争取(for)；苦干；详细分析；
劳工的，工会的；（常大写）（英国或英联邦国家）工党的；

sent.orig: The three kinds of labor in value creation are live labor, transition labor and coagulate labor.
sent.trans: 商品价值创造中的三种劳动是耗费劳动、传导劳动和凝结劳动。

sent.orig: This paper expounds the importance of labor distribution to raise labor efficiency by resolving labor distribution.
sent.trans: 文章通过对劳动分配率的分解，来阐述劳动分配率对正确提高劳动效率的重要性。

sent.orig: The company and the labor (Hereafter called Employee) establish labor relation and make labor contract.
sent.trans: 公司与劳动者（以下简称员工）确立劳动关系，订立劳动合同。

sent.orig: Is your program permitted by the Labor Department of or registered in Labor Department of PRC?
sent.trans: 不知贵公司的项目是否要经过省劳动厅批准，或者已在国家劳动部登记备案？

sent.orig: Content converts the vivid labor that labor is materialize, have material and work double attribute.
sent.trans: 物化劳动是物质化的活劳动，具有物质和劳动两重属性。
